page.title: 12HOUSEHOLD GOODS- PRICES
page.content: We noted the price of goods in different shops in Mullion on 16th July 1985, thinking it might be of interest to you in the future. 2 TOILET ROLLS -33p 1 LARGE BAR SOAP -30p 1 LARGE BOX WASHING POWDER-Â£1.60p 1 DOZEN EGGS -70p, 250gms BUTTER -56p 1lb CHEDDAR CHEESE-Â£1.08p 1 LARGE WHITE LOAF- 48p 1 PINT MILK-23p, 1lb SAUSAGES -54p 1lb CRABMEAT-Â£3.60p,BOX OF MATCHES -6p 1 TUBE TOOTHPASTE -44p 1 LARGE JAR OF MARMALADE -54p 1 LITRE PURE ORANGE JUICE -66p 1 BOTTLE WHISKY -Â£6.99p 20 CIGARETTES -Â£1.33p 1lb NEW POTATOES -8p 1kg SUGAR -46p
